title: Plutus

creator: Block Code LTD
descriptionHtml:
Plutus is an app and card that lets you manage your everyday finances (both crypto and fiat) and earn 3% in crypto rewards for ordinary purchases (both online and in-store).

Manage Fiat

Manage your GBP/EUR from a fiat account (UK Sort Code & Account Number or European IBAN). Plutus is not a bank, but it offers many of the same features provided by upcoming neo-banks.

Manage Crypto

Connect any cryptocurrency wallet you like to your fiat account without revealing the private keys. Stay empowered with sole ownership of your assets.

Swap Fiat & Crypto

A decentralised exchange (PlutusDEX) lets you securely swap between crypto and fiat with 0% fees, without ever having to trust a 3rd party.

Spend Digital Assets

The Plutus Card, issued by Visa, can be loaded with both regular money (GBP, EUR) and converted cryptocurrencies. This means you can easily utilise your crypto assets for shopping.

Pluton Rewards (Crypto Reward)

Go Premium/Pro and earn 3% in crypto rewards (PLU) on any, and all, purchases. We have awarded well over $100,000 worth of crypto rewards.

Plutus Perks (Fiat Reward)

Unlock additional rewards (over 15%) at selected online retailers (Amazon, Nike, Sky, etc.).

Join the Revolution

Plutus creates a bridge between traditional and new-wave financial systems.

Plutus is the only platform that has achieved this whilst staying true to the highly secure and decentralised culture of cryptocurrencies and connect any personal cryptocurrency wallet to the account

title: Plutus | Bank On Crypto

creator: Block Code LTD
descriptionHtml:
Bank on Crypto.

Plutus is a finance app and card for money management (both crypto and fiat) that lets you earn 3% in crypto rewards for ordinary shopping (both online and in-store).

➤ Manage GBP/EUR
Manage your Pound Sterling / Euros from a fiat account (UK Sort Code & Account Number or European IBAN). Plutus is not a bank, but it offers many of the same features provided by upcoming neo banks and more.

➤ Manage Crypto
Connect any crypto wallet you like to your fiat account without revealing the private keys and stay empowered with sole ownership of your cryptocurrencies. This means you can manage cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC) & Ethereum (ETH) alongside your Pound Sterling (GBP) or Euros (EUR) from a single app.

➤ Buy/Sell Fiat & Crypto
A decentralised exchange (DEX) lets you securely buy and sell crypto without ever having to trust a 3rd party. Conversions occur at spot rate with 0% fees for Premium/Pro members. The DEX allows users to:

• Buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) and other currency from other Plutus users
• Sell Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) and other currency to other Plutus users

➤ Spend Digital Assets
The Plutus Card, issued by Visa, can be loaded with both regular money (GBP/EUR) and converted cryptocurrencies (BTC/ETH/PLU). As a DeFi Card, users can top it up with converted crypto from any personal cryptocurrency wallet without sacrificing the private keys.

➤ Pluton Rewards (Crypto Reward)
Users earn 3% in crypto rewards (PLU) on any, and all, valid purchases. We have awarded well over $100,000 worth of crypto rewards.

➤ Plutus Perks (Fiat Reward)
Unlock additional rewards (over 15%) at selected online retailers (Amazon, Nike, Sky, etc.) for staking PLU. Staying true to the DeFi culture, it is possible to stake PLU from any wallet of your choice.

Plutus creates a bridge between traditional finance and new digital assets.

Join the Revolution!
descriptionShort: Manage Money. Buy/Sell Crypto. Spend Crypto (DeFi Visa Card). Earn 3% Rewards.

title: Plutus | Bank On Crypto (Account, Wallet & Card)

creator: Block Code LTD
descriptionHtml:
Bank on Crypto.

Plutus is a finance app and card for money management (both crypto and fiat) that lets you earn 3% in crypto rewards for ordinary shopping (both online and in-store).

➤ Manage GBP/EUR
Manage your Pound Sterling / Euros from a fiat account (UK Sort Code & Account Number or European IBAN). Plutus is not a bank, but it offers many of the same features provided by upcoming neo banks and more.

➤ Manage Crypto
Connect any crypto wallet you like to your fiat account without revealing the private keys and stay empowered with sole ownership of your cryptocurrencies. This means you can manage cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC) & Ethereum (ETH) alongside your Pound Sterling (GBP) or Euros (EUR) from a single app.

➤ Buy/Sell Fiat & Crypto
A decentralised exchange (DEX) lets you securely buy and sell crypto without ever having to trust a 3rd party. Conversions occur at spot rate with 0% fees for Premium/Pro members. The DEX allows users to:

• Buy Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) and other currency from other Plutus users
• Sell Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) and other currency to other Plutus users

➤ Spend Digital Assets
The Plutus Card, issued by Visa, can be loaded with both regular money (GBP/EUR) and converted cryptocurrencies (BTC/ETH/PLU). As a DeFi Card, users can top it up with converted crypto from any personal cryptocurrency wallet without sacrificing the private keys.

➤ Pluton Rewards (Crypto Reward)
Users earn 3% in crypto rewards (PLU) on any, and all, valid purchases. We have awarded well over $100,000 worth of crypto rewards.

➤ Plutus Perks (Fiat Reward)
Unlock additional rewards (over 15%) at selected online retailers (Amazon, Nike, Sky, etc.) for staking PLU. Staying true to the DeFi culture, it is possible to stake PLU from any wallet of your choice.

Plutus creates a bridge between traditional finance and new digital assets.

Join the Revolution!
descriptionShort: Manage Money. Buy/Sell Crypto. Spend Crypto (DeFi Visa Card). Earn 3% Rewards.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: There are no visible front end changes but we make things run smoother behind the scenes.

title: Plutus | Bank On Crypto (Account, Wallet & Card)

creator: Block Code LTD
descriptionHtml:
Join the tens of thousands of customers earning Crypto with Plutus.
Plutus has awarded over $1.5m worth of Crypto to its customers.
Some users have earned $10,000+ worth of Crypto Rewards from shopping with their free Plutus Visa Debit Cards.

Read some of the testimonials from Plutus customers.
“I've earned 1,325 PLU in the last 15 months for my regular monthly spend with the Plutus Card. That's £7,221 worth of savings a year!” - Customer on Twitter (@seansjt)
“I bought this brand new iPad and case with cashback earned with Plutus” - Customer on Twitter (@PJPrydderch)

➤ Crypto Cashback
Earn up to 8% of every purchase back in Crypto Rewards (PLU).

➤ Perks
Select up to 8 Perks of your choice.
Choose from 20 amazing options including 100% rebates on Netflix, Spotify, Amazon Prime, Deliveroo Plus, Apple One, Disney+, and more!

➤ Reward Analytics
Manage your Rewards in-app and enjoy useful analytics and graphs on your PLU earnings.
Withdraw and/or sell your PLU Rewards, or stake them to unlock additional benefits.

➤ All-in-One Finances
Connect any personal Cryptocurrency Wallet to your Plutus Account.
Plutus is completely non-custodial! Retain sole possession of your private keys at all times for maximum security.
Manage both your Cryptocurrencies and Fiat from a single finance app with banking-like features.

Order your free Card today and enjoy an abundance of rewards!
descriptionShort: Earn up to 8% in Crypto Cashback With a Visa Debit Card.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Plutus has released Rewards & Accounts 2.0! 📢
- This is a major update that improves all aspects of the app.
- New Subscription Tiers & Staking Levels
- 20 New Perks
- Increase Crypto Cashback up to 8%
- Added Biometric support
- Streamlined the Onboarding experience
- Temporarily disabled the DEX on Mobile (EEA)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Updated the top-up flow. Pre-loading your card can now be initiated 24/7 and can take up to 1 business day to be processed.
- Updated top-up confirmation screens to reflect the new top-up processing times.
- Waitlist counter is now available in the app. With the new card restock just around the corner, a new counter has been added to the app so you can view your place in the queue. (don't worry, there are enough cards for everyone).
- Several bug fixes and additional security updates.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this update we have:
- Updated and improved the transactions screen whereby each transaction will have a cleaner description and logo. We have also added a sticky date which makes identifying the date of a transaction easier to view.
- Improved the user experience around the card screen, making the screen cleaner and easier to navigate around.
- Added dynamic limits - when making a purchase the app can now track how close you are to your spending limits (this updates daily).
- Bug fixes

title:
Plutus | Bank On Crypto
4.4.1

creator: Block Code LTD
descriptionHtml:
Plutus is a Web3 finance app revolutionising loyalty rewards by blending traditional banking features with blockchain technology. Through its Visa-powered debit card, Plutus has distributed over £20 million in value through tokenised rewards to cardholders.

Customers earn 3% back on every purchase, with non-custodial payouts ensuring transparency and control. Its FUEL system, planned for 2025, aims to increase rewards to 10% by recycling network fees back to users.

Plutus also adds real-world utility to its native token, PLU, allowing redemptions for rewards earned in-app, including £/€10 gift cards, Air Miles, travel discounts, and more through upcoming releases.

By offering transparency, flexibility, and utility, Plutus is transforming traditional loyalty rewards with limited benefits into a lucrative, blockchain-powered system for greater value.
descriptionShort: Shop with your Visa card, earn 3% or more back—it's that simple!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: fixes and improvements
